img_summary: The image depicts a character holding a glowing skull in their hand, surrounded by sparkling particles. The character is adorned with ornate jewelry and wears a robe. The background features a mountainous landscape under a cloudy sky. At the bottom of the image, there is a caption that reads, "You are the sole worthy one to keep it."
